title: The Forty Glock Episode
itunes:title: The Forty Glock Episode
description:
In this episode we sit down with the original industry orphan, 40 Glocc. We discuss his period of being homeless, his introduction to the Colton Crips, being shot multiple times, his relationship with Prodigy from Mobb Deep. 50 Cent and much more.

Rate, subscribe, comment and share.

FollowThe on IG

@thegangsterchroniclespodcast

@biggsteele562
